Company Overview

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”23px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Large scale mineral mining industry ensuring the supreme quality for a brighter tomorrow”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.5.7″ width=”70%” width_tablet=”88%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”64px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”60px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI at a glance

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”28px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”25px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.1em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

About us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”Lato||||||||” link_text_color=”#004b4f” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]

GMCI is a Global Manufacturing Leader of Industrial Minerals based in Ahmedabad, India. With a commitment to Quality, we have a proven track record of more than 14 years. Our core expertise in mining and processing natural minerals like Calcium Carbonate, Kaolin, Mica, Talc, and 30+ market-leading products; Our products are competitively targeting a broad diversity of sectors from Industrial Processing to Consumer Goods.

Without Industrial Minerals, your domestic and vital industrial products would not exist. In a day, you will probably come in contact with at least 100 items manufactured from industrial minerals.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”26px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||11px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We cater to the following business segments,

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#0c71c3″ text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” link_font=”Lato|700|||||||” link_text_color=”#0c71c3″ custom_margin=”-9px||2px|||” custom_padding=”||39px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” link_text_color__hover=”#e02b20″]

> Paint & Coating
> Ceramic
> Cosmetic & Personal Care
> Agricultural
> Construction
> Paper & Board
> Pharmaceutical
> Rubber
> Glass

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Being a Global Leader of the Industry, we successfully cater in the Americas; Europe, the Middle East & Africa (EMEA); and the Asia Pacific (APAC).

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Quartz-Mining-GMCI-PVT-LIMITED.jpeg” alt=”GMCI Mineral and Mining” title_text=”GMCI Mineral and Mining” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.7.4″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”||43px|||” z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_letter_spacing_tablet=”1px” text_letter_spacing_phone=”0px” text_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Vision & Mission:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||35px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have set off with one idea, one pursuit and one belief in mind which is— delivering the best quality minerals to consumers.

We aim at serving the high-performance minerals while emerging as a leader in the mineral manufacturing industry in the global market. Our mission is to expand our business worldwide while staying true to our core values. We are marching ahead with the objective of delivering cost-effective solutions and international consumer satisfaction.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_letter_spacing_tablet=”1px” text_letter_spacing_phone=”0px” text_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Success Mantra:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • World-class manufacturing practices consigning with innovative demand-driven solutions.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Excellent value proposition involving prime corporate status and unique business strategies.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||25px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Client-focused operations aide to accomplish pragmatic and professional targets.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_letter_spacing_tablet=”1px” text_letter_spacing_phone=”0px” text_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Commitment:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||35px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI is passionate about synthesizing better tomorrow, along with a well-defined growth map. GMCI commits to be the most Innovative, Customer-Centric, Sustainable Company in the World. By providing best in class performance, we aim to be a Champion in the Mineral Industry. Our versatile team exerts innovative strategies that focus on market needs and our customer’s needs.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Values:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||36px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With Health being our top priority at GMCI, we are endeavouring towards zero accidents and incidents worldwide. We follow World-Class Manufacturing norms for the safety of our highly skilled workers and employees. The sustainability of GMCI focuses on our consistent devotion to our core values.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Strength:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||35px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The greatest strength of GMCI is its accomplished leaders with a clear commitment to profitable, sustainable growth and their strong decision-making ability. Our commitment to quality with constant development in the way we operate our product lines, goods, and services.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Quality:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||38px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We use uncompromising quality monitoring and do constant enhancements to give our customers with consistent, superior quality products. Our unmatched dedication to quality assurance is our secret to our success.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”map” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”5px||6px|||” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.5.7″ width=”70%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”9px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||3px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHERE WE OPERATE:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/gmci-map.png” alt=”GMCI Export” title_text=”GMCI Export” _builder_version=”4.7.4″ custom_padding=”||52px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]
